ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] OT Complete heal (was Numbers on Bards)
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes with the RIGHT group (ie bard and shaman instead of cleric and enchanter) and four other people who are VERY good - you can go without the enchanter/cleric
ygData.messageBody:
Yes with the RIGHT group (ie bard and shaman instead of cleric and
enchanter) and four other people who are VERY good - you can go without the
enchanter/cleric combo.

My own personal experience with myself doing crowd control - if I don't have
either cleric healing power - or shaman slowing power - I'm going to get
killed trying to do crowd control in Sebelis. Maybe I've been unlucky with
the group's I've had; and also - I haven't got 53 yet - so I'm relying on
Charm or Pixie Strike - but the point I think is still there.

But maybe - I'm just mediocre... Regardless - maybe you feel that 80 per
cent of the people in the game are mediocre. Maybe they are - but to me the
game is about having an enjoyable entertainment experience; not about
competing.

Slyde



-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Sunday, January 21, 2001 4:42 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] OT Complete heal (was Numbers on Bards)


AH HA!!!! someone finally did it and made this incredibly erroneous blanket
statement!!!
Post 50 to go to most locations is NOT in the LEAST impossible without an
enchanter
or cleric. i've personally done necrosis, jail, zonein, zoneout, and some
random mobs
(i.e. the right bridge after the 3 spawn) without a cleric. hell, the time
i camped the bridge
thing i mentioned above was me, ranger and necro, just the 3 of us. i've
done kitchen, bar
and disco without an enchanter. the other night i did crypt (admittedly
with 2 groups, but both
crypt guardian area and emperor area) where a necro and myself handled all
the crowd control,
even tho we had an enchanter (thnx speed, thnx clarity, hahahaha).
